sentences.sContent: I love Mr. Bean… So fitting that he is in the opening. The epitome of dyr British humour.
sentences.sContent_eng: I love Mr. Bean… So fitting that he is in the opening. The epitome of dyr British humour.
sentences.sCn: 我爱憨豆先生……他出现在开幕式中真是太适合了。是英国冷幽默的象征。

remMethod.val: epi (在…后) + tome (一卷书) → 写在一卷书后的话 → 摘要
